question: Ozone layer protects us from which among the following rays?
explanation:
Ozone layer is present in the lower stratosphere portion of the atmosphere and it protects us from the ultraviolet radiations of the sun.
Extra info: Ozone formula - O3.
Direct exposure of skin to untraviolet rays causes skin cancer.Â
